snippet: Gov. John Kasich of Ohio properly allowed a mentally ill inmate, who was hours from a scheduled execution, to vindicate his constitutional rights.
abstract: Editorial praises Ohio Gov John Kasich for granting a two-week reprieve to death row inmate Abdul Awkal after the state Supreme Court failed to grant him a stay of execution; argues that reprieve will allow the court to proceed with a thorough hearing on Awkal's sanity.
lead_paragraph: Gov. John Kasich of Ohio properly allowed a mentally ill inmate, who was hours from a scheduled execution, to vindicate his constitutional rights.
